item.description:
Let's get together for an evening of Turkish food and music.  The Euro Group came here a couple of years ago and the food was very good.  The menu also has a very large selection.

Here is the link to the web site: http://brooklinefamilyrestaurant.com/

There's public parking by the resturant and it is also accessible by the green line.  The closest stop is Brookline Village.
item.how_to_find_us: The reservation is under my name "Noelle."
item.why: This restaurant has a nice atmosphere and the food is delicious!

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Turkish Dinner at Brookline Family Restaurant
